MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G66 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Redbrae Road. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:45am due to underground cable fault located on Redbrae Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:25am on Friday, 16 October 2020
